I will be focusing and moving into the future. I stopped coding after finishing two online courses in web development and ethereum because of my full blown three weeks research on climate change.

I have been encouraged by Dr. Jordan Peterson to take blogging seriously again. He pointed out that the strongest weapon you can possibly acquire in this world is the ability to explain yourself in spoken and written form. Writting articulately unlocks one’s potential to communicate more vividly.

I want to endorse Dr. Peterson’s book as well. I haven’t finished reading it but the fans that talk about this book and his work is so compelling. Here is the link to 12 rules for life: an Antidote to Chaos.
